page.title: 02TRANSPORT
page.content: The closure of the{railway}line in the late 1960's and the increase in the volume of traffic on the roads meant that the{A5 trunk road}between London and Holyhead took on even greater significance. The area is also in close proximity to the{M1}which gives access either to, London or the North of England. A survey of traffic on the A5 was carried out over a 30 minute period from 11:10 am to 11:40 am Northbound Southbound __________ __________ Cars 76 60 Lorries 55 37 Vans 14 11 Farm Machinery 1 1 Buses/Coaches 1 0 M/Cycles 2 0 BiCycles 1 1
